title: Night and Day - description of an old man

content.question: The description of an old man as sitting “somewhat apart” (fifth sentence) primarily serves to emphasize his

choices.label: inability to communicate with ordinary people
desire to instruct the younger members of the family
timidity in certain kinds of social situations
status compared with that of other people who visit the family

content.answer: status compared with that of other people who visit the family

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
